content:
TITLE: Basic Chat UI Implementation using React Components DESCRIPTION: Example showing how to create a basic chat interface using the main components including MainContainer, ChatContainer, MessageList, Message, and MessageInput. Demonstrates importing styles and basic component configuration. SOURCE: https://github.com/chatscope/chat-ui-kit-react/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: jsx CODE: ``` import styles from "@chatscope/chat-ui-kit-styles/dist/default/styles.min.css"; import { MainContainer, ChatContainer, MessageList, Message, MessageInput, } from "@chatscope/chat-ui-kit-react";
; ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Specifying displayName for React Components in chat-ui-kit-react DESCRIPTION: When using components as elements in the type parameter of the getChildren function, each component must have a static displayName property defined. This is crucial for proper functionality within the chat-ui-kit-react library. SOURCE: https://github.com/chatscope/chat-ui-kit-react/blob/master/CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md#2025-04-23_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: JavaScript CODE: ``` static displayName = "YourComponentName"; ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Installing Chat UI Kit React Components using Package Managers DESCRIPTION: Commands for installing the main component library using yarn or npm package managers. SOURCE: https://github.com/chatscope/chat-ui-kit-react/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: sh CODE: ``` yarn add @chatscope/chat-ui-kit-react ``` LANGUAGE: sh CODE: ``` npm install @chatscope/chat-ui-kit-react ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Installing Chat UI Kit Styles using Package Managers DESCRIPTION: Commands for installing the associated styles package using yarn or npm package managers. SOURCE: https://github.com/chatscope/chat-ui-kit-react/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: sh CODE: ``` yarn add @chatscope/chat-ui-kit-styles ``` LANGUAGE: sh CODE: ``` npm install @chatscope/chat-ui-kit-styles ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Markdown Changelog Entry for Version 2.0.0 DESCRIPTION: Major version changelog entry describing breaking changes related to defaultProps removal and React version updates. SOURCE: https://github.com/chatscope/chat-ui-kit-react/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-23_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` # [2.0.0](https://github.com/chatscope/chat-ui-kit-react/compare/v1.10.1...v2.0.0) (2024-03-03) ### chore * removed default props from function components ([84a3302]) ### BREAKING CHANGES * defaultProps have been removed from all function components. It should be backward compatible, but it's safer to release the major version. The default props of some internal class components have also been rewritten. Bumped react and react-dom to 18.2.0 in devDependencies. ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Marking Breaking Changes in Markdown DESCRIPTION: This snippet shows how breaking changes are highlighted in the changelog using Markdown. It includes a description of the change and its significance. SOURCE: https://github.com/chatscope/chat-ui-kit-react/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-23_snippet_6 LANGUAGE: Markdown CODE: ``` ### BREAKING CHANGES * **release:** First stable release ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Formatting Feature Addition in Markdown DESCRIPTION: This snippet demonstrates how new features are documented in the changelog using Markdown. It includes a brief description and a link to the corresponding commit. SOURCE: https://github.com/chatscope/chat-ui-kit-react/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-23_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: Markdown CODE: ``` ### Features * added new message content types ([32439f7](https://github.com/chatscope/chat-ui-kit-react/commit/32439f703361ac951522f8892a01982b8e16ccf8)) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Noting Performance Improvements in Markdown DESCRIPTION: This snippet illustrates how performance improvements are documented in the changelog using Markdown. It includes a description of the change and a link to the relevant commit. SOURCE: https://github.com/chatscope/chat-ui-kit-react/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-23_snippet_5 LANGUAGE: Markdown CODE: ``` ### Performance Improvements * changed fa imports for better tree-shaking ([4807854](https://github.com/chatscope/chat-ui-kit-react/commit/4807854f782b2a16d8e60db6bce59848bed91c1d)) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Documenting Bug Fixes in Markdown DESCRIPTION: This snippet shows how bug fixes are recorded in the changelog using Markdown. It includes a brief description of the fix and a link to the corresponding commit. SOURCE: https://github.com/chatscope/chat-ui-kit-react/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-23_snippet_4 LANGUAGE: Markdown CODE: ``` ### Bug Fixes * better scroll handling ([6f60d88](https://github.com/chatscope/chat-ui-kit-react/commit/6f60d8867513f017c999691a3c1d30e1b46c6748)) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Displaying Version Comparison in Markdown DESCRIPTION: This snippet shows how version comparisons are formatted in the changelog using Markdown syntax. It includes links to the specific commit hashes. SOURCE: https://github.com/chatscope/chat-ui-kit-react/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-23_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: Markdown CODE: ``` # [1.1.0](https://github.com/chatscope/chat-ui-kit-react/compare/v1.0.3...v1.1.0) (2020-12-20) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Markdown Changelog Entry for Version 2.0.3 DESCRIPTION: Changelog entry documenting bug fixes related to GitHub workflow token configuration. SOURCE: https://github.com/chatscope/chat-ui-kit-react/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-23_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` ## [2.0.3](https://github.com/chatscope/chat-ui-kit-react/compare/v2.0.2...v2.0.3) (2024-03-03) ### Bug Fixes * added automatically provided github token to github workflow ([3da88a0]) * removed github token from github workflow ([a674c0c]) ```
